definition: fry (newly hatched fish)/legendary giant fish that could transform into a giant bird 鵬|鹏[Peng2]
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
kun 鯤|鲲[kun1] and peng 鵬|鹏[Peng2], mythological beasts/peng, a gigantic bird transformed from the kun
lit. the giant Peng bird spreads its wings and begins to fly/displaying awesome power and momentum at the outset/to have the world at one's feet

sentences.english: Kun great, I do not know its thousands of miles also.
sentences.chinese: 鲲之大，不知其几千里也。

sentences.english: North-Ming fish, which is named Kun.

definition: kun 鯤|鲲[kun1] and peng 鵬|鹏[Peng2], mythological beasts/peng, a gigantic bird transformed from the kun
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
Chinese toon (Toona sinensis)/tree of heaven (Ailanthus altissima)/(literary metaphor) father
skate (cartilaginous fish belonging to the family Rajidae)/ray (fish)
